sections.title: Error Use Case
paragraphs: The `@id` provided for the `acceptedOffer` is not a URL which corresponds to an `Offer` within the Booking System.

description: A short, human-readable summary of the problem type. It should not change from occurrence to occurrence of the problem, except for purposes of localization.
name.example: The '@id' provided for the 'acceptedOffer' is not a URL which corresponds to an 'Offer' within the Booking System.
name.defaultContent: The '@id' provided for the 'acceptedOffer' is not a URL which corresponds to an 'Offer' within the Booking System.

description: An integer representing the HTTP status code.
